company.name: Neo Financial
company.description:
Neo Financial is a leading Canadian financial technology company that provides a modern, streamlined financial experience for consumers and businesses. 

Our suite of customer products, which include credit, savings, investments, and mortgages, makes financial tools accessible, intuitive, and rewarding for all Canadians.

We work with large enterprises, financial institutions, and local retailers to enhance their value to customers using business products. These products include embedded finance, co-brands, and loyalty tools such as our rewards network and the Neo Store. 

We're passionate about using technology to transform the financial industry and are dedicated to providing Canadians with the best possible financial experience.
 
Interested in working at Neo? Join us as we continue to lead the way in the future of finance.
